ViewObject.Name: LtcEstimateView
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT lte.ID, lte.LTC_PROJECT_ID, lte.STUDY_ID, lte.FUNCTION_CODE, decode(lte.type_code,'FTE','-',lte.SCOPE_CODE) scope_code, lte.IS_EXTERNAL_FTE IS_EXTERNAL_FTE, prg.name program_name, prj.code project_code, prj.name project_name, std.name study_name, std.fpfv study_fpfv, std.lplv study_lplv, tfnc.name top_function_name, fnc.name function_name, lte.COMMENTS, lte.fct_y1_cost fc_d_y1_cost, lte.lt_y1_cost lt_y1_cost, lte.lt_y1_cost - nvl(lte.fct_y1_cost,0) cost_deviation_y1, lte.fct_y2_cost fc_d_y2_cost, lte.lt_y2_cost lt_y2_cost, lte.lt_y2_cost-nvl(lte.fct_y2_cost,0) cost_deviation_y2, lte.fct_y3_cost fc_d_y3_cost, lte.lt_y3_cost lt_y3_cost, lte.lt_y3_cost-nvl(lte.fct_y3_cost,0) cost_deviation_y3, lte.lt_y4_cost lt_y4_cost, lte.lt_y5_cost lt_y5_cost, lte.lt_y6_cost lt_y6_cost, lte.lt_y7_cost lt_y7_cost, lte.lt_y8_cost lt_y8_cost, lte.lt_y9_cost lt_y9_cost, lte.lt_y10_cost lt_y10_cost, lte.lt_y11_cost lt_y11_cost, lte.lt_y12_cost lt_y12_cost, lte.lt_y13_cost lt_y13_cost, lte.lt_y14_cost lt_y14_cost, lte.lt_y15_cost lt_y15_cost, lte.is_discrepancy, fnc.cost_rate function_cost_rate, lte.scope_code as scope_code2, lte.project_phase_code, std.phase_code study_phase_code, phs.name project_phase_name, lte.is_manual, lte.function_Cost_Rate function_cost_rate1, lte.function_name function_name1, lte.project_phase_name project_phase_name1, lte.study_fpfv study_fpfv1, lte.study_lplv study_lplv1, lte.study_name study_name1, lte.study_phase_code study_phase_code1, lte.top_function_name top_function_name1, lte.type_code, lte.project_phase_ordering, lte.fct_y4_cost fc_d_y4_cost, lte.lt_y4_cost - nvl(lte.fct_y4_cost,0) cost_deviation_y4, lte.fct_y5_cost fc_d_y5_cost, lte.lt_y5_cost - nvl(lte.fct_y5_cost,0) cost_deviation_y5, lte.fct_y6_cost fc_d_y6_cost, lte.lt_y6_cost - nvl(lte.fct_y6_cost,0) cost_deviation_y6, lte.fct_y7_cost fc_d_y7_cost, lte.lt_y7_cost - nvl(lte.fct_y7_cost,0) cost_deviation_y7, lte.fct_y8_cost fc_d_y8_cost, lte.lt_y8_cost - nvl(lte.fct_y8_cost,0) cost_deviation_y8, lte.fct_y9_cost fc_d_y9_cost, lte.lt_y9_cost - nvl(lte.fct_y9_cost,0) cost_deviation_y9, lte.fct_y10_cost fc_d_y10_cost, lte.lt_y10_cost - nvl(lte.fct_y10_cost,0) cost_deviation_y10, lte.fct_y11_cost fc_d_y11_cost, lte.lt_y11_cost - nvl(lte.fct_y11_cost,0) cost_deviation_y11, lte.fct_y12_cost fc_d_y12_cost, lte.lt_y12_cost - nvl(lte.fct_y12_cost,0) cost_deviation_y12, lte.fct_y13_cost fc_d_y13_cost, lte.lt_y13_cost - nvl(lte.fct_y13_cost,0) cost_deviation_y13, lte.fct_y14_cost fc_d_y14_cost, lte.lt_y14_cost - nvl(lte.fct_y14_cost,0) cost_deviation_y14, lte.fct_y15_cost fc_d_y15_cost, lte.lt_y15_cost - nvl(lte.fct_y15_cost,0) cost_deviation_y15 FROM ( select id,ltc_project_id,project_phase_code,study_id,function_code,scope_code,is_external_fte,comments,fct_y1_cost,lt_y1_cost,fct_y2_cost,lt_y2_cost,fct_y3_cost,lt_y3_cost,lt_y4_cost,lt_y5_cost,lt_y6_cost,lt_y7_cost,lt_y8_cost,lt_y9_cost,lt_y10_cost,lt_y11_cost,lt_y12_cost,lt_y13_cost,lt_y14_cost,lt_y15_cost,create_date,create_user_id,update_date,update_user_id,cost_start_date,cost_finish_date,is_manual,project_phase_name,study_phase_code,study_name,study_fpfv,study_lplv,top_function_name,function_name,function_cost_rate,fct_prob_y1_cost,fct_prob_y2_cost,fct_prob_y3_cost,type_code,is_discrepancy_profit,is_discrepancy_p6,is_discrepancy,project_phase_ordering,base_cost_source,fct_y4_cost,fct_y5_cost,fct_y6_cost,fct_y7_cost,fct_y8_cost,fct_y9_cost,fct_y10_cost,fct_y11_cost,fct_y12_cost,fct_y13_cost,fct_y14_cost,fct_y15_cost from LTC_ESTIMATE -- Add fake row in case if it was empty sheet union all select -1 id, (select ltcp.id from ltc_project ltcp join ltc_process ltcr on ltcr.id=ltcp.ltc_process_id and ltcr.ltc_tag_id=:TagIdVar and nvl(:ProcessIdVar,ltcr.id)=ltcr.id and nvl(:ProjectIdVar,ltcp.project_id)=ltcp.project_id join project prj2 on prj2.id=ltcp.project_id and nvl(:ProgramIdVar,prj2.program_id)=prj2.program_id where rownum=1) ltc_project_id, (select code from phase where is_active=1 and rownum=1) project_phase_code, null study_id, (select code from function where is_active=1 and rownum=1) function_code, N'INT' scope_code,0 is_external_fte,N'Fake row. Do not use it.' comments,null fct_y1_cost,null lt_y1_cost,null fct_y2_cost,null lt_y2_cost,null fct_y3_cost,null lt_y3_cost,null lt_y4_cost,null lt_y5_cost,null lt_y6_cost,null lt_y7_cost,null lt_y8_cost,null lt_y9_cost,null lt_y10_cost,null lt_y11_cost,null lt_y12_cost,null lt_y13_cost,null lt_y14_cost,null lt_y15_cost,null create_date,null create_user_id,null update_date,null update_user_id,null cost_start_date,null cost_finish_date,0 is_manual,null project_phase_name,null study_phase_code,null study_name,null study_fpfv,null study_lplv,null top_function_name,null function_name,null function_cost_rate,null fct_prob_y1_cost,null fct_prob_y2_cost,null fct_prob_y3_cost,N'ZFAK' type_code,null is_discrepancy_profit,null is_discrepancy_p6,0 is_discrepancy,null project_phase_ordering,null base_cost_source, null fct_y4_cost, null fct_y5_cost, null fct_y6_cost, null fct_y7_cost, null fct_y8_cost, null fct_y9_cost, null fct_y10_cost, null fct_y11_cost, null fct_y12_cost, null fct_y13_cost, null fct_y14_cost, null fct_y15_cost from dual ) lte join ltc_project ltcprj on ltcprj.id = lte.ltc_project_id join ltc_process ltcprc on ltcprc.id=ltcprj.ltc_process_id join project prj on prj.id = ltcprj.project_id join program prg on prg.id = prj.program_id join phase phs on phs.code = lte.project_phase_code join function fnc on lte.function_code=fnc.code join top_function tfnc on tfnc.code=fnc.top_function_code left join study_data_vw std on std.project_id = ltcprj.project_id and std.id = lte.study_id and std.timeline_type_code='RAW' where (lte.type_code=:TypeVar or lte.type_code='ZFAK') and :TagIdVar=ltcprc.ltc_tag_id and nvl(:ProcessIdVar,ltcprc.id)=ltcprc.id and nvl(:ProgramIdVar,prg.id)=prg.id and nvl(:ProjectIdVar,ltcprj.project_id)=ltcprj.project_id order by lte.type_code, prg.name, prj.name, phs.ordering, lte.study_id nulls last, tfnc.name, fnc.name, lte.scope_code
